channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: McConnell Warns Trump against Adopting a Democratic Foreign Policy
item.description: His criticism is reserved for advocates of retrenchment in Trump’s orbit whose influence is the subject of debate.

item.description: They start preparing for college as early as 5th grade.
